text:
Since 5.5 there is an Are you sure? dialog on all HTML Manager actions (as a
result of Bug 29485 ?)
I understand the reasons of Bug 29485, but especially on my development machine
I do find the confirm dialog very annoying. So, what about a compromise and have
an entry in manager web.xml to make the confirm dialog configurable, which could
even be on by default?
creator: juergen@jwi.de

text:
I don't see the point of adding yet more useless complexity. If you're annoyed,
consider using the Ant tasks, or hacking the code a little.
creator: remm@apache.org
